title: 3D Custom Shapes
description: In this video I discuss how to use beginShape(), endShape() and vertex() to create custom shapes in p5.js / WebGL.

timestamps.title: Use beginShape(), endShape(), and vertex() to create custom shape

links.title: Custom Shapes in p5.js
links.description: In this video, I look at how to draw "custom" shapes in p5.js, using beginShape(), endShape(), vertex(), and curveVertex().
